title: 10 Ranked wins in a row.
body:
As per title, just hit my 10th consecutive win in ranked.

I had read (several times) that you were able to skip divisions / tiers after 10 wins, but nothing happened to me? 
I was in my promos from B2 to B1 in my last two wins, does the game for some reason not include promo matches as part of the 10 wins bonus? (eg - technically the system sees me as on 8 wins instead of 10)
Or is the 10 win tier / div skip just a bunch of crap, and doesn't exist?
